meya, wasara 27kata pasuwa ostreliya kandayamen wartha wu adu ma jathyanthara ekdina krikat mulu lakunu sankhyawa wiya.me jayagrahanayath samaga depila athara tharaga pahakin samanwitha ekdina tharagamalawe shri lankawa tharaga 2 ‚Äì 1kin peramunata piwisiyeya.antha parajayak labu ostreliya kandayame eka ma dhanathmaka karanaya wuye owun owunge jathyanthara ekdina krikat kridawe aduma mulu lakunu sankhyawa wana 70 pasu kirimaya.me lakunu pramanaya wartha wi aththe engalanthayata erehiwa ejbastanhidi 1977 wasarediya.
